Steps.Description: Use Trick;
if opponent uses Close Combat
and you get a Choice Scarf, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
and player doesn't get a Choice Scarf, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent uses Flamethrower, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Garchomp, switch to Chandelure then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent uses Night Slash, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum (Super Luck Night Slash 50% crit chance)
if opponent switches out into Darmanitan, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Excadrill, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum
if opponent switches into Garchomp, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock into 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + 2x X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Hariyama, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Salamence, switch to Chandelure then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into  Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent sswitches out into Magnezone, use Earthquake
if opponent sends Cacturne, switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower. switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum. (Use Ice Punch after using X.Speed vs. Gyarados)
if opponent sends out Claydol, switch to Blissey then switch to Chandelure and use Shadow Ball. Switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum. (Use Ice Punch after using X.Speed vs. Gyarados)
if opponent sends out Darmanitan, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent sends out Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath X.Speed then use Ice Punch. Then use Belly Drum and sweep
if opponent switches into Salamence, Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if opponent switches out into Hariyama, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches out, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Salamence, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed (Use Shadow Ball vs. Hariyama)
if opponent stays, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock into 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower;
if opponent sends out Darmanitan, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent sends out Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath X.Speed then use Ice Punch. Then use Belly Drum and sweep
Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed

if opponent switches out into Gyarados, switch to Metagross and use Thunder Punch. It will send in Excadrill, so switch to Chandelure then switch back to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to your own Excadrill Stealth Rock into Swords Dance + X.Speed
Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed Use Shadow Ball vs. Toxicroak
Use Trick;
if you get an Air Balloon, use Stealth Rock then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock into 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if you get a Focus Sash, switch to your own Excadrill Stealth Rock into 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock into 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum
Use Trick;
if opponent stays, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Magnezone, use Earthquake
if opponent sends out Darmanitan, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent sends out Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath X.Speed then use Ice Punch. Then use Belly Drum and sweep
if opponent has Intimidate, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent has Moxie, use Thunder Punch
if opponent sends out Darmanitan, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent sends out Electivire, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches into Absol Close Combat. Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed (Shadow Ball vs. Toxicroak)
if opponent sends out Excadrill, switch to your own Excadrill then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Excadrill Stealth Rock into Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent sends out Garchomp, switch to Excadrill then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Excadrill Stealth Rock into Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if opponent stays, Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Salamence, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed. Use Shadow Ball vs. Hariyama
Use Trick;
if opponent stays, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Gyarados, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Proceed to switch into Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Excadrill, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum
if opponent switches into Garchomp, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock into 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Trick
if opponent doesn’t have Intimidate, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent stays, switch to 2nd Meta, trick, and switch back to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent has Intimidate, use Trick
if opponent stays, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Salamence, switch to Chandelure then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Salamence/Scizor, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if opponent stays, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Excadrill, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum
Use Trick;
if opponent has an Air Balloon, let Metagross die then send in Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent doesn’t have Air Balloon, send in Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock into 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Switch to Chandelure then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum
Use Trick;(Use Shadow Ball vs. Toxicroak)
if opponent stays, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Spiritomb, switch to Blissey and use Trick + Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if opponent uses Foul Play, switch to Blissey and use Trick.  Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock into 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent uses Will-O-Wisp, switch to Blissey then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed (Use Shadow Ball vs. Hariyama)
if opponent switches into Garchomp, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock into 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Hariyama, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Salamence, switch to Chandelure then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed (Use Shadow Ball vs. Hariyama)
if opponent switches into Salamence, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed (Use Shadow Ball vs. Hariyama)
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed (Use Shadow Ball vs. Hariyama)
if opponent switches out into Hariyama, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed (Use Shadow Ball vs. Hariyama)
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Switch to Poliwrath then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed (Use Shadow Ball vs. Hariyama)
if opponent switches into Salamence, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed (Use Shadow Ball vs. Hariyama)
Use Trick;
if opponent stays, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Excadrill, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum
Switch to Blissey and use Trick then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Chandelure then switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum
Switch to Blissey and use Stealth Rock
if opponent switches out into Hydreigon, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick;
if it uses Focus Blast / Flamethrower, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if it uses Dark Pulse, switch into Poliwrath: X.Speed + Belly Drum
if opponent switches out into Lucario, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if you get an Expert Belt, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if you get a Life Orb, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock into 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Meganium, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Then switch to Poliwrath as Lucario comes out
if opponent uses Crunch, Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent uses Extreme Speed, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if you get a Leftovers
and opponent uses Earthquake, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed (Use Iron Head vs. Froslass)
and opponent uses Will-o-Wisp, use Stealth Rock;
if opponent switches out into Houndoom, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill Honchkrow. Switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Hydreigon, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend
if opponent switches into the real Dusknoir, switch to Blissey and use Trick then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Hydreigon
if you get a Choice Scarf, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend
if you get a Focus Sash, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if you get a Life Orb, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure
if opponent uses Fire Blast, switch to Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch back into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Then switch to Poliwrath X.Defend into Belly Drum then X.Speed

if opponent switches into Lucario, switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill it. It will send out Chandelure, so switch to Blissey to force her to switch to Hydreigon and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Blissey and use Trick. Then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed (Use X.Defend before you use Belly Drum vs. Hydreigon)
Switch to Chandelure then switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum
Switch to Blissey and use Trick
if opponent switches into Lucario, switch to Poliwrath;
if opponent uses Crunch, Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent uses Extreme Speed, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Honchkrow, switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower. Hydreigon is sent out, so switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if you get Focus Sash, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X Speed
if you get Life Orb, switch to Blissey and use Stealth Rock. Switch to Metagross then switch back to Blissey and trick.
if opponent switches to Mawile, swap to Poliwrath X.Defend, X.Speed then Belly Drum.
if opponent switches to Dusknoir, swap to Poliwrath Belly Drum then X.Speed.
if you get Choice Scarf, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill Honchkrow. Out comes Hydreigon, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if you get Life Orb
and opponent lands Fire Blast, switch to Blissey and use Stealth Rock
if opponent switches into Lucario, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Mawile, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Blissey and use Trick. Then switch to Poliwrath X.Defend into Belly Drum then X.Speed
and opponent misses Fire Blast, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X Speed
if opponent switches into Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out to Mawile. Switch to Poliwrath X.Defend into Belly Drum then X.Speed
Use Trick;
if opponent uses Aura Sphere
and you get a Focus Sash, use Stealth Rock; (upcoming Hydreigon is already scarfed)
if it stays, switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill it. Out comes Hydreigon, so switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Hydreigon, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed
and you get a Life Orb, switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent uses Final Gambit, send in the second Metagross then switch to Blissey and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure: 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent uses High Jump Kick, switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill it. Switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch again into Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend
if opponent switches out into Hydreigon, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend
if opponent switches out into Mandibuzz, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Meganium
and you get a Life Orb, switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
and you get a Rocky Helmet, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if opponent stays, Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Meganium, use Stealth Rock
if opponent stays, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Poliwrath
if opponent uses Crunch, Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent uses Extreme Speed, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Dusknoir, switch to Excadrill then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Blissey
if opponent uses Foul Play, use Trick as it switches out into Arcanine. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Meganium, switch to Metagross and use Trick.  Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Poliwrath X.Defend + Belly Drum + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if you get a Life Orb, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Mandibuzz, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if you get a Rocky Helmet, use Stealth Rock

if opponent uses Crunch, Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent uses Extreme Speed, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Dusknoir, switch to Excadrill then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Dusknoir, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Mismagius, use Stealth Rock then switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Poliwrath
if opponent uses Crunch, Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent uses Extreme Speed, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Poliwrath
if opponent uses Crunch, Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent uses Extreme Speed, switch to Excadrill and use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Chandelure then switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Stealth Rock
if opponent uses Thunderbolt, switch to Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Hydreigon, switch to Blissey then switch to Metagross
if opponent uses Focus Blast, use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent uses Dark Pulse, let Metagross die. Switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum (2x X.speed + Belly Drum is safer)
if opponent switches out into Lucario, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Lucario, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Sableye, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Poliwrath X.Defend + Belly Drum + X.Speed
Stealth Rock then switch to Blissey and use Trick
if Hydreigon uses Focus Blast, use Softboiled
if opponent does not swap out, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Lucario, switch to  Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Lucario, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Poliwrath X.Defend + Belly Drum + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if opponent uses Flamethrower,  switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches Lucario in.
if opponent uses Close Combat, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent uses Meteor Mash, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Experimental: use an Energy Root + X.Defense on Poliwrath to avoid RNG on Lucario crit and Zoroark Night Daze Accuracy drop.
if opponent switches out into Dusknoir, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Hydreigon, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed (use Earthquake against Walrein)
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill and use Stealth Rock. Switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum
Use Trick, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure: 2x Calm Mind
Use Trick, then use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick and then Stealth Rock;
if opponent stays, switch to Blissey, use Trick. Switch to Chandelure as Hariyama comes outs: 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Energy Ball vs Hariyama if Shadow Ball locked)
if opponent switched out into Walrein, switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed (Energy Ball vs Froslass/Walrein and Shadow Ball on Hariyama)
Use Trick;
if opponent uses Will-O-Wisp, use Stealth Rock
if opponent switches into Beartic, switch to Chandelure then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind
if opponent switches out into Nidoqueen, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind
if opponent stays/switches into anything else, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind
Use Trick;
if it uses Earthquake or switches into Altaria, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Walrein after setting up Stealth Rock, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed
Use Trick, then use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches out into Walrein, switch to Chandelure then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
if opponent uses Hidden Power, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind
if opponent uses Scald, switch to Poliwrath Ice Punch then X.Speed + Belly Drum
if opponent switches into Togekiss, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent uses Surf, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent uses Thunder, switch to Excadrill and use Stealth Rock. Use 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent uses Thunderbolt, switch to Excadrill and use Stealth Rock then switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Blissey, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick; (use Shadow Ball vs Hariyama / use Energy Ball vs Walrein)
if you get a Life Orb;
and opponent uses Earthquake, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
and opponent uses Hidden Power, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if you get a Light Clay, use Stealth Rock;
if it stays, switch to Poliwrath. X.Defense + X.Speed + Energy Root. Belly Drum and Sweep
if opponent switches out into Skarmory, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure: 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed

if opponent got an Attack Boost from Meteor Mash before using Belly Drum, use Earthquake to kill, as it sends out Mamoswine. Switch to Excadrill then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Excadrill: 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Mamoswine, switch into Chandelure, then into second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure: 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Altaria, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Walrein, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Hariyama, switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Mamoswine, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure: 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Serperior, switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Togekiss switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches to Walrein
and it has Chesto Berry, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Shadow Ball against Froslass)
and it has Leftovers, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed
and it has Choice Specs, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed
Switch to Chandelure
if opponent does not switch out, switch to Metagross and use Trick

if opponent switches into Blissey, use Stealth Rock then switch back into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Altaria, switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill and use Stealth Rock. Switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Blissey, switch to Metagross and use Trick then Stealth Rock. Switch back into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speeds
Use Trick, then Stealth Rock. Switch back into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed Use Energy Ball vs. Walrein

if opponent switches into Mienshao, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
if opponent switches into Gallade, Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;

if opponent switches into Beartic, Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind
if opponent switches into Blissey, Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed

and opponent sends out Salamence, switch to Chandelure and switch to the second Metagross and use Trick;
